name: Dream Shooter (Wejdani)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project, I added the following elements: 

  1. Re-Skin of the entire game to be pastel candy themed.
  2. Added a blackhole that sucks in the player and returns them to level 1. 
  3. Added a power up mechanic that turns the players bullets into triple shots that lasts for 4 seconds. 
  4. Customized the UI, Menus and added a "You Win" screen with an animated background. 

Credits 

Created by Wejdan Al-Ahmadi
